property_id.title: Property ID
property_id.description: A Google Analytics GA4 property identifier whose events are tracked. Specified in the URL path and not the body

json_credentials.title: JSON Credentials
json_credentials.description: The JSON key of the Service Account to use for authorization

date_ranges_start_date.title: Date Range Start Date
date_ranges_start_date.description: The start date. One of the values Ndaysago, yesterday, today or in the format YYYY-MM-DD

date_ranges_end_date.title: Date Range End Date
date_ranges_end_date.description: The end date. One of the values Ndaysago, yesterday, today or in the format YYYY-MM-DD
